moves.1. e4: Rather a boring opening in my opinion.
moves.1... f5: Now black is making it more interresting
moves.2. e5: Nope! White doesn't like the idea of the swap
moves.4... g5: Ah, I think black realised that white's bishop was threatening its pawn! But was that the best idea?????!!!!!!!!!!
moves.5. Qh5+: Ha Ha Ha, that was sneaky but obviously successful!!! Lucky old white!
